advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
8tracks is the best place for people who care about music to make & discover refreshingly human playlists.

Need a playlist for a long study session, workout session, or makeout session? Looking for deep house or EDM, indie rock or classic rock, jazz or punk, krautrock or afrobeat? We literally have tons of that stuff (well, maybe not literally). Choose from nearly 2 million super fresh, super free playlists, each lovingly crafted by a real-life human being who loves music as much as you do. Enjoy millions of songs uploaded and curated by people around the world. 

What’s different from other music apps? 

- Free 
- No audio ads 
- Creative playlists with a “soul” behind the music
- Music in every imaginable genre, from every country
- Unmatched music discovery 
- Less repetition
- YouTube & SoundCloud integration 

Join 8tracks’ global community of 8 million monthly listeners. Tune in for free today.
releaseNotes:
New in 3.0.10:
- You may have had trouble logging in with Google+ on iOS 8, but that part of your life is over. It’s fixed now.
- All is right with the world: YouTube track playback is fixed.
- Not a new thing in this release, but we wanted to be clear: we *are* running video ads now. However, we've restricted them to pre-roll ads -- which only play at the beginning of a listening session -- and we're committed to running these only infrequently.*

New in 3.0:
- Momma’s got a beautiful new look
- Animated playlist covers like we’re in Harry Potter or something
- 8tracks Timeline: review playlists you’ve heard and upcoming playlists, travel through time and space.
- New Home screen: automatically shows what you listen to most
- Sleep timer: go to sleep whenever the heck you want without leaving the app running
- Tumblr sharing, in addition to Facebook, Twitter, text, email, link, Tinder (just kidding…maybe)
- Performance improvements and bugs swatted
- Sidebar access to your playlist collections

*We know you’re bummed about this, but we want to be able to provide 8tracks to you for free, which requires the occasional video ad to help defray the substantial cost of royalties we pay to artists and labels. Alternatively, for $20, you can buy a full year of totally ad-free listening. Grab it at Settings > Ad-free on iOS > Upgrade.  Questions? Send us a note anytime at support@8tracks.com or @8tracks on Twitter. You know we love you!
